item.description:
We will be discussing the book MARCHING TOWARD HELL by Michael Scheuer,PhD and a twenty-plus-year CIA veteran. Scheuer headed the agency's Osama bin Laden unit, managed its covert-action operations, and authored its rendition program.

He begins by pointing out that our bipartisan governing elite has an
unquenchable ardor to have the U.S. intervene abroad in all places.
Some prefer diplomatic, others military, humanitarian, covert, and/or
foreign aid mixed with Christian proselytizing. Marching
Toward Hell claims that U.S. foreign policy is often based on
faulty assumptions and can be driven by lobbyists whose interests are
different than those of the American people.

Dr. Scheuer sacrificed his career at the CIA in order to publicly denounce the 9/11
Commission for having become politicized. He did this at a time when
other insiders protected their careers and are only now coming out.
He's also superb at explaining the relationship between the
intelligence community and elected officials in the U.S.

NOTE: this is a WEDNESDAY...not a Monday as usual. But as per usual, tasty organic snacks will be provided.

Please bring a friend and join our discussion even if you have not read the book.
